keyword: calories in an olive garden breadstick
title: Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick
meta_description: Discover calories in an olive garden breadstick, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium details, and simple tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick
assumptions: Standard Olive Garden breadstick (about 47g), fresh-baked with garlic butter topping, as served in the restaurant.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact preparation. Check Olive Garden's official nutrition info or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Olive Garden breadstick contains about 140 calories and 4g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an Olive Garden breadstick?
What is the sodium content in an Olive Garden breadstick?
faqs.a: About 730 mg of sodium, due to the garlic butter and seasoning.

faqs.q: How many carbs in one Olive Garden breadstick?
faqs.a: Around 26 g of carbs, including 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are Olive Garden breadsticks high in fat?
faqs.a: Low fat at 2 g total, with 0.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Can I get nutrition info for multiple Olive Garden breadsticks?
faqs.a: Each adds 140 kcal; two would be 280 kcal total.
